game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the lost artifact of Atlantis
game.description: Long ago, the mysterious artifact of Atlantis was lost. Find it and unveil its hidden power.

tasks.objective: Gather information from the local tavern
tasks.description: Talk to the people at The Sailor's Rest Inn. They might know something.

tasks.objective: Find the hidden map in the old temple
tasks.description: According to the information, there's a map in the forgotten Temple of Neptune. Find it.
Use the map to locate the artifact within the treacherous Underwater Labyrinth of Atlantis.
